text: Tip on how to be a good friend Text them  Even text them first sometimes  Don t always wait for them to reach out to you  Because that makes it look like you don t care  Be the best friend you would want them to be for you  In order to have good friends you have to be one  Send them good morning texts  Tell them goodnight  Occasionally check up on them  Ask them how re they re doing  Make it clear you care about them and that they re somewhat important to you  If it s a friendship you value  act like it

text: How Much suicidal thoughts are normal   What is the normal amount and intensity I haven t had suicidal thoughts since February to be honest  but since school started in the last month or so I ve been getting them back more and more   They aren t that bad  not like I m trying to do it but I m thinking more about it  Yesterday I was taking vitamin D supplement and I thought about overdosing it  I wanted to do it but my mom was near by so I said to myself no   I m also thinking more and more that sucide is the best option I have  Since I left religion I now know there is no hell if I kill myself but I know if I do it I won t get a second life so that s why I m kinda holding on I m always feeling lonely and hate it  I m hating the voice in my head telling me that I m gonna be alone forever  I hate it because the voice is so convincing  it s kinda true  Sucide will shut down this asshole in my head  But I don t want to kill myself since this is the only life I get  what if it does get better   Probably not   it s been bad for few years  probably since I was born tbh   but maybe it will get better I m so desperate for social interactions  today I got some but are short  Will   minutes social interactions gonna make me want to live   What about the   hours I m suffering   Are they really worth it for a social interaction every few days   Im so pathetic lmao The vitamin d overdose isn t the only thing I m thinking about  I thought about jumping in front a car and jumping from a building  they are way more painful tho than dying in sleep because of a overdose tho The sucidal thoughts are kinda more passive than bieng intense  Whenever I see some way I could die I think about it but I never try to do it because I m such a coward

text: I can t keep living like thisEvery day is the same Get back home get yelled at by mom for breathing too loud  Try to do homework  fail cause too depressed and anxious Try to play videogames to distract myself from my shitty life  haha no theyre not fun anymore  because nothing is for some reason  welcome to life you dumb fucking degenerate Try to sleep  cant  voices are too loud  also something might be in my room i shouldn t close my  eyes ori will die instantly Hey how about having a snack  no you fool you should eat a bite and get nauseated and lose your appetite How about hanging out with friends  also no cause your favourite person who made your shitty life better now lives thousands of kilometers away and you will never see them again  well of course you could hang out with other friends  but one is a raging narcissist and the other two forgot you exist Oh look the day is over time to sleep  see point  Wow time to go to school  Wait no you must first have   panic attacks in the morning while also getting yelled at for having anxiety issues  if youre lucky you might actually be able to go to school god i want to fucking die in any way possible  any fucking way  every second of life is more painful than it should be i cant feel anything except for pain  anxiety  sadness  emptiness  is that even a feeling  and fear  i wont succed in the future so what is the fucking point of life if im going to suffer this except i will also be homeless   anyways thank you for coming to my Ted talk
